steps.name: gcr.io/google.com/cloudsdktool/cloud-sdk:latest
args:
NAME_PREFIX=$(openssl rand -hex 12)
for org in $(echo ${_GITHUB_ORGANISATIONS} | sed "s/,/ /g"); do
  gcloud tasks create-http-task "$${NAME_PREFIX}_${org}_request" --queue=${_CLOUD_TASKS_QUEUE} --url="https://europe-west1-${PROJECT_ID}.cloudfunctions.net/${PROJECT_ID}-backup-request-func" --body-content="{"organisation": "${org}"}" --oidc-service-account-email="${PROJECT_ID}@appspot.gserviceaccount.com" --project=${PROJECT_ID} --quiet
  gcloud tasks create-http-task "$${NAME_PREFIX}_${org}_download" --queue=${_CLOUD_TASKS_QUEUE} --schedule-time="$(date -d "1 hour" --utc "+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")" --url="https://europe-west1-${PROJECT_ID}.cloudfunctions.net/${PROJECT_ID}-backup-download-func" --body-content="{"organisation": "${org}"}" --oidc-service-account-email="${PROJECT_ID}@appspot.gserviceaccount.com" --project=${PROJECT_ID} --quiet
done
